channel.title: CVE Feed for Digital Arts Inc. -- m-FILTER Ver.5 Series and Ver.4 Series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Digital Arts Inc. -- m-FILTER Ver.5 Series and Ver.4 Series

item.title: CVE-2023-22278|2024-08-02T10:07:05.433Z -- digital%20arts%20inc. -- m-filter%20ver.5%20series%20and%20ver.4%20series
item.description: m-FILTER prior to Ver.5.70R01 (Ver.5 Series) and m-FILTER prior to Ver.4.87R04 (Ver.4 Series) allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass authentication and send users' unintended email when email is being sent under the certain conditions. The attacks exploiting this vulnerability have been observed.
